notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceptualization, A.A.S., S.C.W. and M.D.; methodology, A.S.; O.F. (Oumar Faye); B.N.; J.C.; software, B.N. and J.C.; validation, A.A.S.; D.M.; A.T.D. and S.C.; formal analysis, A.S.; B.N.; and J.C.; investigation, A.S.; O.N.; O.F. (Ousmane Faye); and B.S.; data curation, A.S.; O.N.; and B.S.; writing—original draft preparation, A.S.; J.C.; and B.N.; writing—review and editing, A.A.S.; D.M.; A.T.D.; S.C.; and S.C.W.; visualization, B.N.; funding acquisition, A.A.S.; and S.C.W. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
